mapper.select:
select count(*) from (
select Date,BSC,NAME,SETNAME,PARID,VALUE,UNIT,CLASS,DISTRIB,STATUS,FCVSET,FCVALUE,DCINFO,FCODE from cdd_DBTSP_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'
) as ABCD

select.foreach:
select Date,BSC,NAME,SETNAME,PARID,VALUE,UNIT,CLASS,DISTRIB,STATUS,FCVSET,FCVALUE,DCINFO,FCODE from cdd_DBTSP_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'

select count(*) from (
select Date,BSC,MO,MAXPWR,MAXTRX,PAO,TXMPWR,IPM,MIXEDMODE,MINFREQ,MAXFREQ,CCMD,CCTP,EMTP,EMDI,EMRA from cdd_RXMOP_MCTR_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'
) as BRR

select.foreach:
select Date,BSC,MO,MAXPWR,MAXTRX,PAO,TXMPWR,IPM,MIXEDMODE,MINFREQ,MAXFREQ,CCMD,CCTP,EMTP,EMDI,EMRA from cdd_RXMOP_MCTR_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'

mapper.select:
select count(*) from (
select Date,BSC,MO,RXD,BAND,ANTA,ANTB from cdd_RXMOP_RX_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'
) as BSS

select.foreach:
select Date,BSC,MO,RXD,BAND,ANTA,ANTB from cdd_RXMOP_RX_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'

mapper.select:
select count(*) from (
select Date,BSC,MO,RSITE,AHOP,COMB,FHOP,MODEL,SWVERREPL,SWVERDLD,SWVERACT,TMODE,CONFMD, CONFACT,TRACO,ABISALLOC,CCCHCMD from cdd_RXMOP_TG_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'
) as BTT

select.foreach:
select Date,BSC,MO,RSITE,AHOP,COMB,FHOP,MODEL,SWVERREPL,SWVERDLD,SWVERACT,TMODE,CONFMD, CONFACT,TRACO,ABISALLOC,CCCHCMD from cdd_RXMOP_TG_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'

mapper.select:
select count(*) from (
select Date,BSC,MO,CELL,CHGR,TEI,SIG,MCTRI,SWVERREPL,SWVERDLD,SWVERACT,DCP1,DCP2 from cdd_RXMOP_TRX_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'
and CELL in
'${cell}'
) as BUU

select.foreach:
select Date,BSC,MO,CELL,CHGR,TEI,SIG,MCTRI,SWVERREPL,SWVERDLD,SWVERACT,DCP1,DCP2 from cdd_RXMOP_TRX_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'
and CELL in
'${cell}'

mapper.select:
select top ${cnt} Date,BSC,MO,CELL,CHGR,TEI,SIG,MCTRI,SWVERREPL,SWVERDLD,SWVERACT,DCP1,DCP2 from (select row_number() over(order by A.Date) as rownumber,* from (
select Date,BSC,MO,CELL,CHGR,TEI,SIG,MCTRI,SWVERREPL,SWVERDLD,SWVERACT,DCP1,DCP2 from cdd_RXMOP_TRX_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'
and CELL in
'${cell}'
) A) B where B.rownumber >${startIndex}

select count(*) from (
select Date,BSC,MO,CELL,CHGR,BAND,ANT,MPWR from cdd_RXMOP_TX_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'
and CELL in
'${cell}'
) as BVV

select.foreach:
select Date,BSC,MO,CELL,CHGR,BAND,ANT,MPWR from cdd_RXMOP_TX_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'
and CELL in
'${cell}'

mapper.select:
select count(*) from (
select Date,BSC,MO,STATE,BLSTATE from cdd_RXMSP_MCTR_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'
) as BWW

select.foreach:
select Date,BSC,MO,STATE,BLSTATE from cdd_RXMSP_MCTR_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'

mapper.select:
select count(*) from (
select Date,BSC,MO,STATE,BLSTATE,BLO,BLA,LMO,BTS,CONF from cdd_RXMSP_TG_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'
) as BXX

select.foreach:
select Date,BSC,MO,STATE,BLSTATE,BLO,BLA,LMO,BTS,CONF from cdd_RXMSP_TG_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'

mapper.select:
select count(*) from (
select Date,BSC,MO,CELL,CHGR from cdd_RXTCP_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'
and CELL in
'${cell}'
) as BYY

select.foreach:
select Date,BSC,MO,CELL,CHGR from cdd_RXTCP_${date} where 1=1
and BSC in
'${bsc}'
and CELL in
'${cell}'
